channel.title: Yet Another King Rework Thread
channel.description:
**EDIT::** I don't like this idea anymore, since having to choose between Royal Finger or Decide Fate adds a high level of strategy to current King. So nevermind lol.
I love the new King without Order Execute. The differences between Good and Evil King seem to have been cleverly implemented as well. However, I am of the opinion that further changes could be made to emphasize the concept of King as a political leader. I very much like the Gladiator ability from Mafia, so I replaced Royal Finger with it and made King's double-accuse a passive.
> # [color=gray]The King[/color] > **[color=gray]Special[/color]** > >**Majesty (Passive)** - Your accusations of treason count as two. You are immune to death at night once. > >**Loyalty (Passive)** - _(Starting Good King only)_ If you are executed, nobody can be accused of treason for one day (two days, if you are executed before Day 4). > >**Royal Finger (Day)** - Only you or the person you accuse may be accused of treason today. - 1 use > >**Decide Fate (Day)** - Decide whether to execute or pardon the player on the stand. - 1 use > >**Designate Heir (Night)** - Permanently grant or remove royal blood. - 1 use

item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
As Cult King I once lied about CW claiming Hunter. Of course that made the CW rightly call me evil, so I called him a fool and told the knight to cs him. When the Knight called him death immune yet he flipped CW, it caused a lot of confusion.

I’m not sure if the distraction and confusion was worth me guarding the CW in the end, but it sure was funny and we did win.

But again I am not sure if framing people in this way is worth the risk, ultimately. I just want to keep my options open.

item.title: Yet Another King Rework Thread
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
EDIT:: I don’t like this idea anymore, since having to choose between Royal Finger or Decide Fate adds a high level of strategy to current King. So nevermind lol.

I love the new King without Order Execute. The differences between Good and Evil King seem to have been cleverly implemented as well. However, I am of the opinion that further changes could be made to emphasize the concept of King as a political leader. I very much like the Gladiator ability from Mafia, so I replaced Royal Finger with it and made King’s double-accuse a passive.

The King

Special

Majesty (Passive) - Your accusations of treason count as two. You are immune to death at night once.

Loyalty (Passive) - (Starting Good King only) If you are executed, nobody can be accused of treason for one day (two days, if you are executed before Day 4).

Royal Finger (Day) - Only you or the person you accuse may be accused of treason today. - 1 use

Decide Fate (Day) - Decide whether to execute or pardon the player on the stand. - 1 use

Designate Heir (Night) - Permanently grant or remove royal blood. - 1 use
